purpose: Enhance browser productivity by allowing users to execute tasks online using AI-driven commands.
principle: Built with React for the UI and TypeScript for robust application logic, leveraging GPT models for AI capabilities.
reusability: Can be integrated as a browser extension, offering APIs for command execution and task automation.
limitations: Limited to browsers that support extensions, dependent on GPT model availability and internet connectivity.
name: fuji-web
description: Fuji is an AI agent that lives in your browser's sidepanel. You can now get tasks done online with a single command!
highlight: Fuji integrates seamlessly into your browser's sidepanel, enabling task automation with simple commands.
